restaurantInfo.name: Hunan Bar
restaurantInfo.description: Hunan Bar is the most famous Chinese restaurant in Davis
restaurantInfo.accessibility:
Entrance and Parking
 1. Accessible Parking Spaces: Clearly marked, with the correct width for vans/wheelchairs.
 2. Ramps/Curb Cuts: Easy for wheelchair users and people with mobility devices to enter
                3. Doorways: Wide enough to accommodate wheelchairs.
            Pathways and Seating
                1. Interior Pathways: Hallways and aisles allow easy maneuverability.
                2. Tables and Seating: Some tables are accessible to individuals using wheelchairs.
            Restrooms
  1. Accessible Stall(s): Grab bars, proper turning radius, and accessible fixtures are available.
 2. Signage: We do not have visual‑assistant signage.
policies: we do not allow any type of pet in the store
restaurantInfo.greetingMessage: Hi, this is Hunan Bar 湖南酒家. How can I help you?
restaurantInfo.offlineGreetingMessage: Hi, this is Hunan Bar restaurant (湖南酒家). We are currently closed and not accepting food orders at this time.
